title: I don't understand the logic of some of these players in Ranked
body:
My team
-Only Leona leashed for Volibear at gromp while Draven went straight to lane
-Volibear died to red buff and blamed the shit leash from Leona
-He then blames Draven for not leashing at all
-Draven asks for a gank since he is 20 cs down and has died twice to Ashe
-Volibear says that there will be no ganks for bot
-Draven goes on to die another three times racking up a whopping 5 deaths by about 10 minutes
-Draven then goes on to blame Leona for being a shit support
-Draven tells everyone to fuck off and tells Leona to go top leaving him in a 1v2 lane
-Draven feeds the Ashe until she looked like Gragas
-Draven didn't end up showing to any teamfights

Was on a heater too, 6 wins in a row, all the way from 0 LP to my promos. And then first game of promos, I get this.

replies.body: Promos are so daunting lol. And yeah man, I certainly tried to calm them down but it didn't help. Not only that but all three of them argued back and forth so childishly, I wouldn't have been suprised if they were all 7 years old.
If the Voli died to red when he started Gromp it's his own fault. It's the complete other side of the jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=jb3navides,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EEIm535H,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2014-12-30T05:03:28.491+0000)
>
> Try carrying kid. It isn't hard if you don't play like a %%%%%.

Carried nearly every game that day. And that game I cs'd well and was on about 7/1 I think. Until the Ashe started one shotting everyone

> [{quoted}](name=jb3navides,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EEIm535H,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2014-12-30T05:59:47.002+0000)
>
> 7/1 only, carry harder ;D.

Man not by end of the game xD Probably just after laning phase
Lol and dying in the jungle with the Voli passive is just embarassing man lol

Damn, I feel sorry for you dude. Draven seems like the root of a lot of the toxicity, but Volibear was rude for blaming Leo.
A lot of ADCs won't own up to their own errors though, and will blame supports, which I hate. I have been blamed by people when supporting when they have had  horrible plays resulting in their deaths. However, I have gotten my unranked friend with 50 wins fed against low silvers. While I do make bad plays here and there, and sometimes feed horribly, I admit they are my failures. I do blame the ADC sometimes as support though, where I deem it appropriate. However, I think we all need to admit our own failures to properly succeed.
And also, we need to point out other people's failures in a constructive way, rather than through flaming. If you can get a player to improve a tiny bit on the spot, rather than insulting them and lowering morale, you will have a better chance at success.

Honestly Promotion series is the worst...... I would duo tbh..... If u go solo rito always decided u to put u on %%%% teams... Then your %%%%ed...{{champion:17}}  Goodluck with whatever your trying to do....
